2b6e97cf-ee1c-42d3-9d96-ca18a19dd074.description: The earner of this badge has successfully completed all four courses of the program, including activities that demonstrate online instructional design competency, such as: developing an online course development process outline/schedule, identifying strategies/resources for creating online faculty development experiences, applying learning theories to relevant teaching scenarios, identifying strategies for staying current with emerging practices, and applying the OSQCR rubric and review process.
2b6e97cf-ee1c-42d3-9d96-ca18a19dd074.name: OLC Instructional Designer Certificate Program

badge_template_activities.title: ID1: Helping Faculty with New Course Development
ID2: Curating and Evaluating Resources for Faculty
ID3: Professional Foundations: Collaborating, Researching, and Networking
ID4: Course Quality Review (OSCQR)

3f24c417-761b-4f6f-bd72-49b9f612cad5.description: The earner of this badge has completed the Course Quality Review (OSCQR) course and is certified as a qualified OSCQR trainer, enabling them to train faculty at their own institutions. During the course, participants completed a formal course review using OSCQR and recommended improvements and institutional implementation strategies, and as a culminating activity created a customized version of the OSCQR rubric to address the course quality needs at their institution.
3f24c417-761b-4f6f-bd72-49b9f612cad5.name: OLC Course Quality Review (OSCQR) Trainer

badge_template_activities.title: Course Quality Review (OSCQR)

4a0afeab-f080-4e07-bf18-f9c743c601e4.description: The earner of this badge has successfully completed the requirements of the OLC Online Teaching Certificate Program 10-week foundation course. Successful participants will have drafted a course design plan and course syllabus that reflects quality standards and developed an online activity with an assessment that aligns with course outcomes.
4a0afeab-f080-4e07-bf18-f9c743c601e4.name: Online Teaching Certificate Program Foundation Course

badge_template_activities.title: Online Teaching Certificate Foundation Course

7f7cd8fa-a5e1-4b46-9c91-7032d95fc892.description: The earner of this badge has registered for and is verified as having successfully completed the requirements of the OLC Online Teaching Certificate Program. They have completed the 10-week foundation program, the required electives (3 workshops or 1 mastery series), and have created a fully developed or revised online or blended course and presented it during a live recorded session in the presence of their mentor. The recipient can create or revise a fully developed online or blended course.
7f7cd8fa-a5e1-4b46-9c91-7032d95fc892.name: Online Teaching Certificate Program

badge_template_activities.title: Online Teaching Certificate Program

4172ab61-2065-4502-811f-8cec2f6030c2.description: The earner of this badge has successfully completed the requirements for the Instructional Design Mastery Series. Throughout the series, learners focus on learning outcomes and assessment, instructional strategies, and course management and evaluation of courses that can occur in various online learning environments. Participants will explore common instructional design techniques (based on relevant research) and use such strategies to help in designing an effective learning unit.
4172ab61-2065-4502-811f-8cec2f6030c2.name: Instructional Design Mastery Series

badge_template_activities.title: Instructional Design Mastery Series

00e78a7a-c9d7-492e-8d27-f255b6eb9e50.description: The earner of this badge has successfully completed the OLC 2-week training on Quality in Online Learning. This training program will help McGraw-Hill faculty consultants to better support, mentor, and provide virtual coaching to faculty at various institutions on effective practices of quality online learning, including course design, facilitation, and assessment.
00e78a7a-c9d7-492e-8d27-f255b6eb9e50.name: Quality in Online Learning (OLC/McGraw-Hill)

badge_template_activities.title: Earner successfully completed the 2-week OLC training "Quality in Online Learning."

9b769679-d76f-478c-ae2f-1a5a2a4c45bc.description: The recipient of this badge has registered for and is verified as having successfully completed the requirements for the Institute for Emerging Leadership in Online Learning (IELOL) program. This includes completing the online pre-immersion course, participating in the immersion experience, participating in the Masters Class at OLC Accelerate, and completing an online status update on the post-immersion project.
9b769679-d76f-478c-ae2f-1a5a2a4c45bc.name: Institute for Emerging Leadership in Online Learning (IELOL)

badge_template_activities.title: Institute for Emerging Leadership in Online Learning (IELOL)

5fa52081-38a2-46a3-b732-7f6e8725dbb0.description: The earner of this badge has successfully completed all 12 weeks of the Advanced Online Teaching Certificate Program and completed activities that demonstrate advanced online teaching competencies. This includes: using the OSQCR and QCTIP scorecards to complete a course design review, expanding knowledge of various assessment techniques, exploring active learning strategies and student engagement techniques, and becoming more aware of common accessibility standards.
5fa52081-38a2-46a3-b732-7f6e8725dbb0.name: Advanced Online Teaching Certificate Program

badge_template_activities.title: Advanced Online Teaching Certificate 12-Week Program

7433f8a4-5554-4c1f-a74b-f692dc94697d.description: The earner of this badge has successfully completed the Online Science Labs Mastery Series. Participants will have reviewed best practices in the design and implementation of virtual science labs and explored evidence-based research revealing how the integration of online science labs can improve students' experience. Participants will transform their online science lab course into a creative, engaging, and highly motivated learning community that will attract new online learners.
7433f8a4-5554-4c1f-a74b-f692dc94697d.name: Online Science Labs Mastery Series

badge_template_activities.title: Online Science Labs Mastery Series

37288c42-6c78-4daa-8704-a70a4e43c134.description: The earner of the Accessibility badge has successfully completed at least 4 of the 6 required 7-day workshops focused on accessibility and DEI. These workshops will enable participants to: identify the barriers/challenges students with disabilities face in online learning, evaluate the current accessibility of course materials, develop a Digital Accessibility Plan, and review strategic actions to support DEIA in online learning.
37288c42-6c78-4daa-8704-a70a4e43c134.name: Accessibility

badge_template_activities.title: Online Teaching Essentials: ADA & Digital Accessibility
Accessible Course Design Using WCAG
Practical Applications for Universal Design for Learning (UDL)
Digital Accessibility: Developing a Strategic Plan
Reframing Disability: Language, Media, and Universal Design
Diversity, Equity, Inclusion, and Accessibility (DEIA) in Online Learning

989257ef-5bae-4f98-bfcb-5761b4a2ad54.description: The earner of this badge has successfully completed the Leadership in Online Learning Mastery Series, focusing on organizational structure, policy, and common funding models related to distance learning programming at the institutional level. At the conclusion of the series, participants will align their institution's mission, goals, and values with the creation of an institutional plan draft for implementing successful online learning programs, with consideration for budgeting and finance.
989257ef-5bae-4f98-bfcb-5761b4a2ad54.name: Leadership in Online Learning Mastery Series

badge_template_activities.title: Leadership in Online Learning Mastery Series

ac495cfc-2a69-4028-a565-7570cf622e76.description: The earner of this badge has successfully completed the Online Nursing Mastery Series, where they explored theories for fostering student engagement through the integration of educational technology. Successful participants will have created a multimedia instructional component for the online course, incorporated the three types of engagement, and showcase a project integrating educational technology components based on teaching and learning theories and best practices in online learning.
ac495cfc-2a69-4028-a565-7570cf622e76.name: Online Nursing Mastery Series

badge_template_activities.title: Online Nursing Mastery Series

9e7d0d57-ffcc-4a5f-9f03-57acee507c84.description: The earner of this badge has successfully completed the OLC 2-week training on Quality in Online Learning. This training program will help Cengage faculty consultants to better support, mentor, and provide virtual coaching to faculty at various institutions on effective practices of quality online learning, including course design, facilitation, and assessment.
9e7d0d57-ffcc-4a5f-9f03-57acee507c84.name: Quality in Online Learning (OLC/Cengage)

badge_template_activities.title: Earner successfully completed the 2-week OLC training "Quality in Online Learning."

ceb629ac-8523-41a0-acf7-d921f19bfcdb.description: The earner of this badge has successfully completed the requirements of the two synchronous workshops focused on copyright compliance and fair use. These workshops have enabled the participant to describe six rules for course design as they pertain to avoiding copyright infringement, identify methods to apply the six rules for course design, describe best practices in Fair Use and recognize the legal implications of copyright infringement.
ceb629ac-8523-41a0-acf7-d921f19bfcdb.name: Copyright Compliance & Fair Use

badge_template_activities.title: Copyright & Fair Use, Part I: The Fundamentals
Copyright & Fair Use, Part II: From Court Decisions to Best Practices

31c93074-fe2c-4590-ba98-86a7823f4cb7.description: The earner of this badge has successfully completed the requirements of the two 7-day workshops focused on Learner Experience Design Methods. These workshops will enable participants to create a basic set of student personas, develop a student journey map for a course, workshop, or program, and prototype a new, or iterate upon an existing course module using information acquired while building the student journey map.
31c93074-fe2c-4590-ba98-86a7823f4cb7.name: Learner Experience (LX) Design Methods

badge_template_activities.title: LX Design Methods, Part 1 - Personas
LX Design Methods, Part 2 - Experience Mapping

eade5a02-e836-448e-8a2c-1730994ecbd2.description: The earner of this badge has successfully completed the Blended Learning Mastery Series: Research into Practice. Series topics include a review of recent literature and standards, institutional implementation of blended learning, evidence-based best practices, scholarship, and evaluation of blended teaching and learning. Successful participants will complete a personal action plan proposing strategies for and addressing challenges to implementing a blended learning program at their institution.
eade5a02-e836-448e-8a2c-1730994ecbd2.name: Blended Learning Mastery Series: Research into Practice

badge_template_activities.title: Blended Learning Mastery Series: Research into Practice

969517f9-34b5-495c-b079-3c07c68d253e.description: The OLC Digital Learning Innovation Award is earned through exemplary use of digital courseware to improve student success, especially among minority, first-generation and other underrepresented student groups. This badge is awarded to institutions whose projects inspire innovation, increase access, support implementation, improve outcomes, enable accessibility, and promote sustainability in the use of digital courseware.
969517f9-34b5-495c-b079-3c07c68d253e.name: OLC Digital Learning Innovation Award

badge_template_activities.title: Demonstrate exemplary use of digital courseware to improve student success, especially among minority, first-generation and other underrepresented student groups.

1b8812fb-5b4d-44ef-a631-a2264d1675e0.description: The earner of this badge has successfully completed the Quality Scorecard Mastery Series. In this series, learners focused on the implementation of the OLC Quality Scorecard for the Administration of Online Programs. Successful participants identified strategies for implementing the scorecard, evaluated their program using the nine categories within the scorecard, identified areas for improvement, and developed an improvement plan based on the Quality Scorecard evaluation process.
1b8812fb-5b4d-44ef-a631-a2264d1675e0.name: Quality Scorecard Mastery Series

badge_template_activities.title: Quality Scorecard Mastery Series

979371e5-86ca-4c3d-a475-65a5b0791379.description: The earner of this badge is verified as having attended and successfully completed the requirements for their selected OLC Innovate pre-conference workshop. This includes: meaningfully contributing to in-depth discussions and collaborative activities, participating in an in-depth examination of the topics of the workshop, and completing all activities related to the learning objectives of the workshop.
979371e5-86ca-4c3d-a475-65a5b0791379.name: OLC Innovate 2020 Pre-Conference Workshop

badge_template_activities.title: Attend one of the OLC Innovate 2020 Pre-conference Workshops and meaningfully contribute to small group discussions and collaborative activities.

e9f8af6a-849d-46a9-ae9f-8f3f24cd3abf.description: The earner of this badge has successfully completed the requirements of the three 7-day workshops focused on the essentials of online teaching. The learner can differentiate between online and face-to-face courses, create a learning resource for an online course, identify and use various web-appropriate content formats, identify key components of an effective online syllabus, describe important considerations for effective online learning activities, and discuss accessibility issues.
e9f8af6a-849d-46a9-ae9f-8f3f24cd3abf.name: Online Teaching Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: Online Teaching Essentials 1: Getting Started
Online Teaching Essentials 2: Converting Your Course
Online Teaching Essentials 3: Course Design Basics

e20150c9-2950-40b4-9a6b-2263ef1a6efa.description: The earner of this badge has successfully completed the requirements of the two 7-day workshops focused on neuro, cognitive, and learning sciences in education. The learner can identify common misconceptions about teaching and learning, establish effective strategies for teaching, assessment, and design, use evidence-based practices to support metacognitive development, learning, memory, and transfer, and create a customized journal of practice and a best-practices neuroeducation checklist.
e20150c9-2950-40b4-9a6b-2263ef1a6efa.name: Neuro, Cognitive, and Learning Sciences

badge_template_activities.title: Neuro, Cognitive, and Learning Sciences, Part I: Bringing Theory to Practice
Neuro, Cognitive, and Learning Sciences, Part II: Applying Theory to Practice

e1c699a9-3f7e-44d1-a539-303f4091bcbf.description: The earner of this badge is verified as having attended and successfully completed the requirements for their selected OLC Innovate pre-conference workshop. This includes: meaningfully contributing to in-depth discussions and collaborative activities, participating in an in-depth examination of the topics of the workshop, and completing all activities related to the learning objectives of the workshop.
e1c699a9-3f7e-44d1-a539-303f4091bcbf.name: OLC Innovate 2021 Pre-Conference Workshop

badge_template_activities.title: Attend one of the OLC Innovate 2021 Pre-conference Workshops and meaningfully contribute to small group discussions and collaborative activities.

3e047bd8-58fb-4254-b243-da1e15c31cc7.description: The earner of this badge is verified as having attended and successfully completed the requirements for their selected OLC Accelerate pre-conference workshop. This includes: meaningfully contributing to in-depth discussions and collaborative activities, participating in an in-depth examination of the topics of the workshop, and completing all activities related to the learning objectives of the workshop.
3e047bd8-58fb-4254-b243-da1e15c31cc7.name: OLC Accelerate 2020 Pre-Conference Workshop

badge_template_activities.title: Attend one of the OLC Accelerate 2020 Pre-conference Workshops and meaningfully contribute to small group discussions and collaborative activities.

c6db8ead-7920-4836-bb19-49ddc23bd6be.description: The earner of this badge has attended an OLC webinar hosted by online experts covering industry hot topics, best practices, and special interests in education and digital learning.
c6db8ead-7920-4836-bb19-49ddc23bd6be.name: OLC Webinar Attendee

badge_template_activities.title: OLC Webinar Attendee: Disability Equity by Design Series - Part 3: Equitable Online Environments

256a0258-7036-4809-bee7-903d859b23d2.description: The earner of this badge has attended an OLC webinar hosted by online experts covering industry hot topics, best practices, and special interests in education and digital learning.
256a0258-7036-4809-bee7-903d859b23d2.name: OLC Webinar Attendee

badge_template_activities.title: OLC Webinar Attendee: Effective Facilitation of Online Discussions with Students

e1a9124f-646c-4f86-8420-1abddcb43121.description: The recipient of this badge has registered for and is verified as having successfully completed the requirements for the Advanced Instructional Designer badge. They have completed all four 4-week required courses and have completed activities that demonstrate advanced online instructional design competency.
e1a9124f-646c-4f86-8420-1abddcb43121.name: Advanced Instructional Designer

badge_template_activities.title: Project Management for Instructional Designers
Getting Started with Research
Applying the Neuro, Cognitive, and Learning Sciences to Instructional Design
Data Stories: An Introduction to Data Visualization

364b542c-fd22-48ba-8b1b-fdecd5ada19e.description: The earner of this badge has successfully completed the requirements of the two 7-day workshops focused on open educational resources (OER). As a result, the learner can identify OER and motivations for using them, describe open licenses and their purpose, analyze best practices for finding/adopting OER, identify strategies to engage teaching faculty in adopting, adapting, and creating OER, create an OER implementation plan for a course/program, and support OER faculty in implementing OER.
364b542c-fd22-48ba-8b1b-fdecd5ada19e.name: Open Educational Resources (OER)

badge_template_activities.title: OER, Part I: Exploring Open Educational Resources
OER, Part II: Implementing Open Educational Resources

aba10544-c6a9-49dc-80a1-05cdc20c521b.description: The earner of this badge has successfully completed the requirements of the two 7-day workshops focused on gamification principles and game-based learning. The learner can discuss the parallels between game design theory and successful learning environments, design an activity incorporating elements of game design, implement sound game design principles for learning in the development of a game-based project, determine the most appropriate development platform and build a basic game demo.
aba10544-c6a9-49dc-80a1-05cdc20c521b.name: Gamification

badge_template_activities.title: Gamification Principles and Strategies
Game-Based Learning

d4d96e75-62de-4350-b2d5-81ae39d9d3b5.description: The earner of this badge has attended an OLC webinar hosted by online experts covering industry hot topics, best practices, and special interests in education and digital learning.
d4d96e75-62de-4350-b2d5-81ae39d9d3b5.name: OLC Webinar Attendee

badge_template_activities.title: OLC Webinar Attendee: Disability Equity by Design Series - Part 1: Re/Framing Disability, Part 2: Disabled By Design, Part 3: Equitable Online Environments.

5fdd629f-4c09-41c4-a28e-5cf07b88150a.description: The earner of this badge has successfully completed the requirements of the three 7-day workshops focused on faculty development and support. As a result, the participant has identified research-based practices for retaining quality adjunct faculty, developed a support plan for online adjunct/part-time/non-tenured faculty, developed a faculty evaluation form aligned with institutional goals, and developed a workload management plan for themselves or their faculty.
5fdd629f-4c09-41c4-a28e-5cf07b88150a.name: Faculty Foundations

badge_template_activities.title: Supporting Online Adjunct Faculty
Evaluating Online Faculty
Managing Workload and Reducing Burnout

a865a820-f480-44d8-bac9-c96709e92d55.description: The earner of this badge has attended an OLC webinar hosted by online experts covering industry hot topics, best practices, and special interests in education and digital learning.
a865a820-f480-44d8-bac9-c96709e92d55.name: OLC Webinar Attendee

badge_template_activities.title: OLC Webinar Attendee: Disability Equity by Design Series - Part 2: Disabled by Design

967d73f6-bf45-4aca-a496-0b4d5689b345.description: The earner of this badge has successfully completed the Mobile Learning Mastery Series: Connect, Create, and Consume. Through a series of modules, the participants explored mobile connection methods and strategies for connecting with others and with course content, developed a mobile learning connection plan, developed a teaching unit with mobile learning options, and critiqued assessment approaches for their mobile learning activities.
967d73f6-bf45-4aca-a496-0b4d5689b345.name: Mobile Learning Mastery Series: Connect, Create, and Consume

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all required activities and deliverables in the Mobile Learning Mastery Series: Connect, Create, and Consume.
Submit the mobile teaching micro-unit within the course.
Submit all required activities and achieve a 90% or higher as the final course grade.
